channel.title: GFX- Pease Help- Nearly completed
channel.description:
Alright, i am trying to get some 508 gfx on a 317, and i am wondering what is necessary to do to the model before adding it to my client, i looked at swats godsword gfx, and it looks like the model id and spin that is added to the class 23.
Ima try to muscle through it, but any help is appreciated.
also i am trying miasmic gfx and morrigans javs, already have all the models.
alright:: mostly successful, but if you notice during the animation the model glitches, what next? [size=20pt]100% Morrigans Javelins!!!![/size] Normal Speed::: [URL=http://img4.imageshack.us/i/javs2.gif/][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/6598/javs2.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img4/javs2.gif/1/][IMG]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/javs2.gif/1/w399.png[/img][/URL]
Slow Speed::: [URL=http://img26.imageshack.us/i/javs4.gif/][IMG]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/8889/javs4.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img26/javs4.gif/1/][IMG]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/javs4.gif/1/w399.png[/img][/URL]
